thread.title: Taylor Swift and Zayn Malik Fifty Shades I Don't Wanna Live Forever Acoustic Videos
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift and Zayn Malik Fifty Shades I Don't Wanna Live Forever Acoustic Videos

author: Maggie Maloney
title: Taylor Swift and Zayn Malik Fifty Shades I Don't Wanna Live Forever Acoustic Videos
text:
Zayn Malik and Taylor Swift Both Released Acoustic Versions of "I Don't Wanna Live Forever" 
And we're not sure which one we love more. Most Popular By Maggie Maloney Feb 3, 2017 The Zayn Malik and Taylor Swift collaboration "I Don't Wanna Live Forever" from Fifty Shades Darker is the gift that keeps on giving. Even after the super sexy music video and the video of Taylor and bestie/Zayn's GF Gigi Hadid singing, dancing, and making semi-awkward hand motions to the song made their rounds, we can't get enough. And on one glorious day, both Zayn and Taylor released acoustic versions. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below While Taylor's is only a tease, Zayn's is the entire song filmed in a moody, dimly lit recording studio. Most Popular Taylor's shorter video is actually a rehearsal for the DIRECTV Super Bowl event. Her version is equally moody, but thankfully better lit. BRB, listening on repeat. Follow Marie Claire on F acebook for the latest celeb news, beauty tips, fascinating reads, livestream video, and more. More from Marie Claire:
